content: single double triple scarf by marinda lariz materials yarn approximately 200 yards of worsted or dk weight or amount needed to obtain desired length 200 yards will make a scarf approximately 50 long hook size i 5 5mm abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tc triple or treble crochet notes shown in malabrigo rios colorway zarzamora *chains at the end of each row will count as 1st stitch be sure to make a stitch in the top of the chain at the end of each row *17 sts worked in each row there will be a total of 18 sts including the chain sts i recommend counting every couple of row to make sure you are still on track *for a variation on the pattern place stitches in spaces between stitches from previous row rather than in top of each stitch another variation would be to work through the front or back loops instead of the through the top of each stitch *use a larger or smaller crochet hook to adjust the softness/drape of your scarf pattern chain 19 setup row single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across chain 1 turn 18 sts row 1 single_crochet across chain 2 turn row 2 double_crochet across chain 2 turn row 3 double_crochet across chain 3 turn row 4 tc across chain 3 turn row 5 tc across chain 2 turn row 6 double_crochet across chain 2 turn row 7 double_crochet across chain 1 turn row 8 single_crochet across chain 1 turn *repeat row 1-8 until desired length is reached final row single_crochet across cut yarn and weave in ends enjoy © 2016 marinda lariz all rights reserved pattern is for personal non-profit use only 1 of 1
